script
suspend_unscripted_advice true
suspend_during_battle on

declare_counter loop

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType roman_rebels
		console_command control roman_rebels
		snap_strat_camera 0, 156
		zoom_strat_camera 0.8
		while I_LocalFaction greek_cities
		end_while
		snap_strat_camera 0, 156
		zoom_strat_camera 0.8
		call_object_shortcut strat_ui save_stratmap
		inhibit_camera_input true
		disable_entire_ui
		hide_ui
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType greek_cities
		console_command control greek_cities
		snap_strat_camera 0, 156
		zoom_strat_camera 0.8
		while I_LocalFaction roman_rebels
		end_while
		snap_strat_camera 0, 156
		zoom_strat_camera 0.8
		call_object_shortcut strat_ui save_stratmap
		inhibit_camera_input true
		disable_entire_ui
		hide_ui
	end_monitor

while I_CompareCounter loop = 0
end_while
end_script
